author: laurenweigle
title: Warren Beatty & Faye Dunaway Mess Up at Oscars – ‘Moonlight’ Wins Best Picture, Not ‘La La Land’
text:
(Getty)
At tonight’s 2017 Oscars, presenters Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway delivered the wrong winner for Best Picture, announcing La La Land as the winner. Unfortunately for them, the movie Moonlight is the actual Best Picture winner.
Video coming shortly.
Lauren Weigle is a senior contributor to Heavy specializing in celebrity and reality television. She has an extensive background in entertainment, fashion, PR, lifestyle and journalism. Follow her on Twitter @NYCPRTeam . 
February 27, 2017 12:19 am
